Wistia - Video Hosting for Businesses - Cambridge, MA

Robby from Wistia here. We give companies the best stats and features to grow their businesses with video.

We're growing fast and operating at a pretty huge scale (10s-100s of millions of events per day). We have a highly service oriented architecture and are looking for front-end, back-end and full stack engineers who can come in and own various pieces of it.

You can apply here: https://boards.greenhouse.io/wistia/jobs/45347#.VPNp2FPF-Hw or email me directly at robby@wistia.com if you have any questions. Thanks!
